name: QuestionnaireCCARSSuicideDangerToOthersRating
title: Questionnaire CCARS Suicide Danger To Others Rating
description: Extent to which a person experiences self-harming thoughts and/or behaviors.

concept.display: No indication of self-destructiveness or self-endangerment
Self-harmful tendencies are evident from speech and/or previous behavior, and person may experience harmful thoughts with minimal danger to self
Self-harmful thoughts and/or actions are present and are of serious concern
Self-harmful thoughts and/ or actions are persistent, affecting most aspects of daily functioning
Requires immediate intervention to prevent suicide or physical self-injury
